trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel que dispõe de forma dinâmica o conteúdo em uma grade composta por linhas e colunas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its contents in a grid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle organiza seu conteúdo em uma grade.

trans-unit.source: Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes.
trans-unit.target: Como o layout é executado tanto em tempo de design quanto em tempo de execução, ele pode ser alterado dinamicamente à medida que o ambiente do aplicativo muda.

trans-unit.source: This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization.
trans-unit.target: Assim, os controles no painel têm a capacidade de redimensionar proporcionalmente, portanto ele pode responder a alterações como o redimensionamento do controle pai ou à alteração de comprimento do texto devido à localização.

trans-unit.source: Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, including other instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer controle de formulários do Windows pode ser um filho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle, inclusive de outras instâncias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você possa criar layouts sofisticados de adaptação a mudanças em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle pode ser expandido para acomodar novos controles quando eles são adicionados, dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> property to a value of 0 specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> will be unbound in the corresponding direction.
trans-unit.target: Configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> propriedade para um valor de 0 especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> será desacoplado na direção correspondente.

trans-unit.source: You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full of child controls.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode controlar a direção de expansão (horizontal ou vertical) após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle está completo de controles filho.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle se expande para baixo, adicionando linhas.

trans-unit.source: If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se você desejar linhas e colunas que se comportam de maneira diferente do comportamento padrão, você pode controlar as propriedades de linhas e colunas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties of rows or columns individually.
trans-unit.target: É possível definir as propriedades de linhas ou colunas individualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle adiciona as seguintes propriedades para seus controles filhos: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, e `RowSpan`.

trans-unit.source: You can merge cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode mesclar células no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle definindo o `ColumnSpan` ou `RowSpan` propriedades em um controle filho.

trans-unit.source: To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, e `RowSpan` propriedades em tempo de execução, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para ler o `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, e `RowSpan` propriedades em tempo de execução, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetCellPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de ancoragem de controles filho é igual a outras caixas de controles.

trans-unit.source: The anchoring behavior of child controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> differs from the behavior in other container controls.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de ancoragem de controles filho em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> difere do comportamento em outros controles de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the child control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>, the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property and the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor do controle filho <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right>, o controle será colocado em relação a borda esquerda ou direita da célula, a uma distância que é a soma do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> propriedade e o painel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right> values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> values taken into account.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Left> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Right> valores são definidos, o controle será dimensionado para a largura da célula, com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> valores levados em conta.

trans-unit.source: The behavior for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom> anchoring is analogous.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Top> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles.Bottom> ancoragem é semelhante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Como ancorar e encaixar controles filho em um controle TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md).

trans-unit.source: If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar de um controle filho para simular o comportamento de ancoragem padrão em outros controles de contêiner, você pode ajustar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> propriedades para manter uma distância constante entre a borda do controle e a borda da célula.

trans-unit.source: Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Definir os valores de ambos o `Column` e `Row` propriedades de um controle filho como -1 fará com que o controle a ser movido para a primeira célula vazia no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: Na célula vazia será escolhida em uma pesquisa que vai da esquerda para a direita e de cima para baixo.

trans-unit.source: This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts.
trans-unit.target: Essa ordem é dependente de cultura, para que ele se comportará corretamente em layouts do direita para esquerda (RTL).

trans-unit.source: Only controls that have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property set to `true` participate in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control's layout computations.
trans-unit.target: Somente controles que têm o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> propriedade definida como `true` participar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> cálculos de layout do controle.

trans-unit.source: Also see:
trans-unit.target: Consulte também:

trans-unit.source: [How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como alinhar e alongar um controle em um controle TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como abranger linhas e colunas em um controle TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)
trans-unit.target: [Como editar colunas e linhas em um controle TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control.md)

trans-unit.source: [Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)
trans-unit.target: [Passo a passo: organizando controles nos Windows Forms usando um TableLayoutPanel](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel.md)

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> método para criar uma aparência personalizada para uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedades com seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda para o painel.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values describing the style of the border of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> valores que descrevem o estilo da borda do painel.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo das bordas da célula.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" /> values describing the style of all the cell borders in the table.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle" /> que descrevem o estilo de todas as bordas de célula na tabela.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellBorderStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Definir esse valor fará com que o painel para redesenhar a mesmo e seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade dependendo selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a célula é redesenhada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> named `TableLayoutPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> chamado `TableLayoutPanel1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de colunas na tabela.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas no controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> propriedades para layouts com um número conhecido e fixo de células.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar uma propriedade ou o outro se você espera que o número de células no layout crescem, supondo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade permite esse crescimento.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> for 0, o painel crescerá adicionando linhas e se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> é 0, o painel crescerá adicionando colunas.

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: Especificando o crescimento de painel com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade é preferível à configuração <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> como 0, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Controles podem ser adicionados ou excluídos da tabela usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of column styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de estilos de coluna para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> for each column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> que contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> para cada coluna no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific columns.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A> propriedade para acessar as propriedades de estilo de colunas específicas.

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> classe para definir as características de colunas individuais na tabela.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle organiza suas colunas, ele atribui prioridades a cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated.
trans-unit.target: Colunas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> são considerados são alocados primeiro e as larguras fixas.

trans-unit.source: Columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: Colunas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> são dimensionados para seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among columns with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: Espaço restante é dividido entre colunas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> properties of each column when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> propriedades de cada coluna quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de controles contida dentro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> containing the controls associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutControlCollection" /> que contém os controles associados ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property contains all of the controls associated with the table, including controls that may not be currently displayed because of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> limitations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propriedade contém todos os controles associados à tabela, incluindo controles que não podem ser exibidos no momento porque <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> limitações.

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir enumera todos os controles filho no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da coleção de controle para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" /> atribuído ao controle.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: Um controle contido em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a linha e a coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a posição da célula.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição de coluna do controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: A posição de coluna do controle filho especificado ou -1, se a posição de <paramref name="control" /> for determinada por <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method will return the lowest column index.
trans-unit.target: Se `control` abrange dois ou mais colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> método retornará o índice da coluna mais baixo.

trans-unit.source: The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da posição de coluna é baseadas em zero, portanto você pode usá-lo como um índice para a matriz retornada por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnWidths%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `Column` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a posição atual de `control`, mesmo quando sua posição é determinada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the column index for each control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir enumera todos os controles filho no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> e localiza o índice da coluna para cada controle usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> não é um tipo que pode ser organizado por esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of columns spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de colunas ocupadas pelo controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas ocupadas pelo controle filho.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: A abrangência de coluna geralmente é útil para o posicionamento de um controle que é consideravelmente maior do que seus colegas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `ColumnSpan` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> métodos para definir a largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz que representa as larguras, em pixels, das colunas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the widths, in pixels, of the columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que contém as larguras, em pixels, das colunas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The column position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A posição da coluna do controle a ser recuperada.

trans-unit.source: The row position of the control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A posição da linha do controle a ser recuperada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the child control occupying the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o controle do filho que ocupa a posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: The child control occupying the specified cell; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no control exists at the specified column and row, or if the control has its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle do filho ocupando a célula especificada; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se nenhum controle existir na coluna e linha especificadas ou se o controle tem sua propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible" /> definida como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The column and row position values are zero based.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de posição de linha e coluna são baseadas em zero.

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the cell positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> by looping through the columns and rows given by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A> method to retrieve the control at each cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir enumera todas as posições de célula no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> fazendo um loop através das colunas e linhas fornecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A>e, em seguida, chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetControlFromPosition%2A> método para recuperar o controle em cada célula.

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="column" /> or <paramref name="row" /> (or both) is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="column" /> ou <paramref name="row" /> (ou ambos) é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: Um controle contido em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a linha e a coluna da célula que contém o controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the cell position.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a posição da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> método retorna a posição real da atual `control`, mesmo se sua posição é determinada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method takes into account the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control state, including column or row spanning and when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Esse método leva em conta todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> estado de controle, incluindo a coluna ou linha abrangência e quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A> colocou um controle com seu `Column` e `Row` propriedades definidas como -1.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to the situation in which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> return -1.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente à situação na qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumn%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> retornará -1.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a posição de linha do controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The row position of <paramref name="control" />, or -1 if the position of <paramref name="control" /> is determined by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: A posição da linha do <paramref name="control" /> ou -1 se a posição do <paramref name="control" /> for determinada por <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: If `control` spans two or more rows, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method will return the lowest row index.
trans-unit.target: Se `control` abrange dois ou mais linhas, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> método retornará o menor índice de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da posição de linha é baseadas em zero, portanto você pode usá-lo como um índice para a matriz retornada por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowHeights%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `Row` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter a posição atual de `control`, mesmo quando sua posição é determinada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.LayoutEngine%2A>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetPositionFromControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> and finds the row index for each using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir enumera todos os controles filho no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> e localiza o índice de linha para cada um usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRow%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is not a type that can be arranged by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> não é um tipo que pode ser organizado por esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array representing the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz que representa as alturas, em pixels, das linhas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the heights, in pixels, of the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que contém as alturas, em pixels, das linhas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of rows spanned by the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o número de linhas ocupadas pelo controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas ocupadas pelo controle filho.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 1.

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: A abrangência de linha geralmente é útil para o posicionamento de um controle consideravelmente mais alta do que seus colegas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `RowSpan` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> métodos para definir a largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> deverá ser expandido para acomodar novas células quando todas as células existentes forem ocupadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> indicating the growth scheme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> que indica o esquema de crescimento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.AddRows" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control expands downward by adding rows.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle se expande para baixo, adicionando linhas.

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to add a control to a full <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control, and the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>, then an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se for feita uma tentativa de adicionar um controle a um completo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle e o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize>, então um <xref:System.ArgumentException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property depending on the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade dependendo selecionado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>.

trans-unit.source: At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: No tempo de execução, quando o usuário clica no botão **GrowStyle do teste**, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle é adicionado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle está cheio, expande adicionando uma linha ou coluna, ou ele gera uma exceção, dependendo do valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is invalid for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é inválido para a enumeração <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the panel's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância armazenada em cache do mecanismo de layout do painel.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the panel's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> para conteúdo do painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa as configurações de layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> containing the table layout settings.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> que contém as configurações de layout de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />, or an attempt was made to set <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> directly, which is not supported; instead, set individual properties.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é <see langword="null" /> ou foi feita uma tentativa de definir <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings" /> diretamente, o que não tem suporte; em vez disso, defina propriedades individuais.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" /> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call when the cell should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada quando a célula deve ser atualizada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> method to create a custom appearance for a cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.OnCellPaint%2A> método para criar uma aparência personalizada para uma célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the panel to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o painel a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a tela de fundo do painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas na tabela.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: You can specify both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> propriedades para layouts com um número conhecido e fixo de células.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property allows for such growth.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar uma propriedade ou o outro se você espera que o número de células no layout crescem, supondo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade permite esse crescimento.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> for 0, o painel crescerá adicionando linhas e se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> é 0, o painel crescerá adicionando colunas.

trans-unit.source: Specifying panel growth with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is preferred to setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> to 0, however.
trans-unit.target: Especificando o crescimento de painel com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade é preferível à configuração <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowCount%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnCount%2A> como 0, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Controles podem ser adicionados ou excluídos da tabela usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.Controls%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of row styles for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de estilos de linha para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> containing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> for each row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection" /> que contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle" /> para cada linha no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> property to access the style properties of specific rows.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A> propriedade para acessar as propriedades de estilo de linhas específicas.

trans-unit.source: You can use members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> classe para definir as características de linhas individuais na tabela.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> in the following order:
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle organiza suas linhas, ela atribui prioridades a cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> na seguinte ordem:

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated.
trans-unit.target: Linhas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Absolute> são considerados é alocados primeiro e sua altura fixa.

trans-unit.source: Rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> are sized to their contents.
trans-unit.target: Linhas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.AutoSize> são dimensionados para seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Remaining space is divided among rows with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.
trans-unit.target: Espaço restante é dividido entre linhas com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SizeType.Percent>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> properties of each row when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle> propriedades de cada linha quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: A altura e a largura dos limites do controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> que especifica os limites do controle a ser usado ao definir seu tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona o local de um controle, tamanho, preenchimento e margem.

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control horizontally.
trans-unit.target: A razão pela qual dimensionar o controle horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: The ratio by which to scale the control vertically
trans-unit.target: A razão pela qual dimensionar o controle verticalmente

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of scaling the entire panel and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Executa o trabalho de dimensionamento do painel inteiro e dos controles filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A> method uses the `dx` and `dy` parameter values to scale both the height and width of the panel independently.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ScaleCore%2A> método usa o `dx` e `dy` valores de parâmetro para dimensionar a altura e a largura do painel de modo independente.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a cell.
trans-unit.target: Um controle contido em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a linha e a coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> that represents the row and the column of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition" /> que representa a linha e a coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another column.
trans-unit.target: O controle a ser movido para outra coluna.

trans-unit.source: The column to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
trans-unit.target: A coluna para a qual <c>control</c> será movido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the column position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Define a posição de coluna do controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method moves the control to another column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> método Move o controle para outra coluna a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: As linhas e colunas têm índices com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: Definir a posição da coluna como -1 Especifica que o controle irá fluir para a primeira célula vazia.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método reaplicará o layout da tabela para todos os controles de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `Column` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> método alternar dois controles contidos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle com pelo menos duas linhas.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to span.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas a serem ocupadas.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of columns spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Define o número de colunas ocupadas pelo controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers.
trans-unit.target: A abrangência de coluna geralmente é útil para o posicionamento de um controle que é consideravelmente maior do que seus colegas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `ColumnSpan` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetColumnSpan%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumnSpan%2A> métodos para definir a largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é menor que 1.

trans-unit.source: The control to move to another row.
trans-unit.target: O controle a se mover para outra linha.

trans-unit.source: The row to which <c>control</c> will be moved.
trans-unit.target: A linha para a qual <c>control</c> será movido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the row position of the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Define a posição de linha do controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A> method moves the control to another row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRow%2A> método Move o controle para outra linha no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The columns and rows have zero-based indexes.
trans-unit.target: As linhas e colunas têm índices com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: Setting the row position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell.
trans-unit.target: Definir a posição da linha como -1 Especifica que o controle irá fluir para a primeira célula vazia.

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método reaplicará o layout da tabela para todos os controles de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `Row` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> method to swap two controls contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetColumn%2A> método alternar dois controles contidos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control with at least two rows.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle com pelo menos duas linhas.

trans-unit.source: A child control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to span.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas a serem ocupadas.

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of rows spanned by the child control.
trans-unit.target: Define o número de linhas ocupadas pelo controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers.
trans-unit.target: A abrangência de linha geralmente é útil para o posicionamento de um controle consideravelmente mais alta do que seus colegas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo `RowSpan` propriedade, que o painel adiciona a seus controles filhos em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> methods to set the width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GetRowSpan%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.SetRowSpan%2A> métodos para definir a largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controle em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é menor que 1.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> para receber as propriedades de extensão.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se este objeto puder fornecer propriedades de extensão ao objeto especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>.
